plotEnv

PURPOSE

plotEnv Plots labeled environment

SYNOPSIS

function h = plotEnv(env, obstacles)

DESCRIPTION 

 plotEnv Plots labeled environment

 Input: 'env' structure representing environment
 Output: Plot of environment

SOURCE CODE 

0001 function h = plotEnv(env, obstacles)
0002 % plotEnv Plots labeled environment
0003 %
0004 % Input: 'env' structure representing environment
0005 % Output: Plot of environment
0006 %
0007 % :copyright: 2014 by the California Institute of Technology
0008 % :license: BSD 3-Clause, see LICENSE for details
0009 
0010 assert(env.util.dim == 2 || env.util.dim == 3);
0011 
0012 h = figure;
0013 hold on
0014 
0015 %% Plot the obstacles, not the safe region.
0016 % Obstacle boundaries
0017 ops.shade = 0.1;
0018 ops.color = [0.5, 0.5, 0.5];
0019 plot(obstacles, ops);
0020 
0021 % Obstacles
0022 q = env.util.e;
0023 if env.util.dim == 2
0024     Q = unitbox(2, q);
0025 else
0026     Q = unitbox(3, q);
0027 end
0028 ops.shade = 0.65;
0029 ops.color = [0.5, 0.5, 0.5];
0030 %plot(minus(obstacles, Q), ops);
0031 
0032 
0033 %% Plot APs
0034 ops.shade = 0.25;
0035 fields = fieldnames(env.AP);
0036 for i = 1:numel(fields)
0037     ops.color = 'g';
0038     plot(env.AP.(fields{i}), ops);
0039     for j = 1:length(env.AP.(fields{i}))
0040         pts = extreme(env.AP.(fields{i})(j));
0041         if env.util.dim == 2
0042             text(mean(pts(:,1)), mean(pts(:,2)), fields{i}, 'FontSize',18)
0043         else
0044             text(mean(pts(:,1)), mean(pts(:,2)), mean(pts(:,3)), fields{i}, 'FontSize',18)
0045         end
0046     end
0047 end
0048 
0049 % Plot formatting
0050 axis(env.util.arena)
0051 grid off
0052 hXLabel = xlabel('x (m)');
0053 hYLabel = ylabel('y (m)');
0054 set( gca                       , ...
0055     'FontName'   , 'Helvetica' );
0056 set([hXLabel, hYLabel], ...
0057     'FontName'   , 'AvantGarde');
0058 set([hXLabel, hYLabel]  , ...
0059     'FontSize'   , 18          );
0060 set(gca, ...
0061   'Box'         , 'off'     , ...
0062   'TickDir'     , 'out'     , ...
0063   'XColor'      , [.1 .1 .1], ...
0064   'YColor'      , [.1 .1 .1], ...
0065   'LineWidth'   , 1         , ...
0066   'FontSize'    , 16);
0067 
0068 grid on
0069 drawnow
0070 
0071 end
